instanceVariables.name: Active
instanceVariables.desc: True (1) when this field is active and listening to typed keys.

instanceVariables.name: OutOfFocus
instanceVariables.desc: True (1) if this InputField cannot be active due to another layer showing above it.

instanceVariables.name: AllowsSpaceChars
instanceVariables.desc: True (1) if the input field allows the "Space" character.
